---
title: "Foreword"
---

This tutorial aims to give you the tools to easily and efficiently create, and maintain your own online portfolio.

It is divided in three chapters : 

1. The first chapter focuses on creating a simple workflow for the rest of our work.\
    We will use **Git**, **Github**, and **Visual Studio Code**.
2. The second capter focuses on the design of the website.\
    We will use **Quarto**.
3. The third and last chapter focuses on the publication of our website.\
    We will use **Github Pages**.

No prior programming experience is required to follow this tutorial. 

I hope you will enjoy it :grin: !
